description: Protesters rally in Warsaw and other cities after a court ruling bans almost all abortions.
title: Poland abortion ruling: Protests spread across the country
title_page: Poland abortion ruling: Protests spread across the country - BBC News
maintext: In the early hours of Friday morning, protesters clashed with riot police outside the Warsaw home of Deputy Prime Minister Jaroslaw Kaczynski, who heads the governing Law and Justice (PiS) party. Police said officers used pepper spray and physical force when some protesters threw stones and tried to push through the cordon around the house.
